name: Hebi-Doku
description: The Hebi-Doku is a sleek, serpentine creature embodying chaos, known for its striking appearance and menacing demeanor.
memorable: It excels in controlling combat with its venomous attacks and ability to command snakes telepathically.
goals: To incapacitate and dominate foes in battle while utilizing venomous tactics.
relations: Often found in the company of snakes or serving as an ally to other fey creatures.
environment: Typically inhabits lush or chaotic natural environments, often near water sources.
strengths: Immunity to poison damage and condition, combined with high Dexterity making it difficult to hit.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to radiant damage, which can be exploited in combat.
attacks: Utilizes a deadly array of attacks including a venomous bite, disabling sting, and toxic spit.
most_powerful_ability: Transfixing Rattle, which can incapacitate and freeze opponents in place temporarily.
senses: Possesses keen smell, granting advantage on Perception checks relying on it.
skills: Proficient in perception, allowing it to effectively detect hidden enemies.
additional_information: Damage immunity to poison and immunity to poisoned condition.
Ability to command snakes within 120 feet telepathically.
High Dexterity and Constitution, enhancing evasion.
Capable of multiattack, maximizing damage in a single turn.
Tactical advantage of incapacitating enemies and controlling the battlefield.
test_queries: medium fey that uses toxic spittle attack
